name: Oven Baked Wings and Brussel Sprouts
keywords: Oven Baked, Wings, Brussel Sprouts, Chicken, Snack, Appetizer, Easy, Spicy, Roast, Chicken Wings, Baked Chicken, Healthy, Side Dish, Vegetables, Party Food, Game Day, Quick, Simple, Weeknight Dinner, Family Friendly
description: Spicy juicy wings with crispy sprouts dripping with spicy chicken juices. Fantastic by itself or with some potatoes baked in too.
recipeIngredient: 1 bulb of Garlic, split into cloves

recipeInstructions.text: Mix half of the spice mix ingredients together in a large container with the wings ensuring they are evenly coated in the spice mix.
recipeInstructions.name: Prep chicken

recipeInstructions.text: Mix the rest of the ingredients in a large baking tin ensuring everything is coated in the mix.
recipeInstructions.name: Prep tray

recipeInstructions.text: Place wings on top and bake for 50 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Bake

recipeInstructions.text: Serve and enjoy! Can have it by itself or with some potatoes or rice.
recipeInstructions.name: Serve

notes: Super simple chicken wings that yield super tasty results. You can also use whole cumin seeds for a stronger flavour, if you do this use 2-3 tsp of whole cumin seeds.
Great baked with some potatoes. If you do, boil them to within an inch of their lives first.
